channel.title: More? on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in More? on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Vortex Ring State
item.description:
I’ve been checking some aviasimulators. The gateway drug was free Falcon BMS with strong focus on F-16. Then Huey helicopter model in DCS got me intrigued and I’m trying it for a couple of days. In helicopters that are not overly automated, stability is not granted at all and requires special attention of the pilot. That makes them interesting.

Flying over the cold war Berlin freshened up Der Himmel Ã¼ber Berlin in the memory. Considering technicalities of the flight I saw Apocalypse Now also. Mixing technology and arts, I wanted to bring the odd can of soup painting into the post but maybe I was just hungry.
